sentences.en: A squadron of F-15 fighters is on its way home.
sentences.cn: 一个F-15战斗机中队正在返程途中。

sentences.en: All right, Skull Squadron, jettison Synchro Cannon modules immediately.
sentences.cn: 好吧, 骷髅中队, 立刻抛弃同步炮模块.

sentences.en: Both of the dead men were identified as from No 15 squadron.
sentences.cn: 两名死者都被认出是15中队的.

sentences.en: He passed out in November 1924 and was posted to No 24 Squadron.
sentences.cn: 他于1924年11月毕业，被派往空军第24中队。

sentences.en: He understood at once that he was the logical man to succeed Duluth as squadron commander.
sentences.cn: 他立即意识到,由自己来接替杜鲁斯担任中队长是合乎逻辑的.

sentences.en: He was posted to Hong Kong as second-in-command of C Squadron.
sentences.cn: 他被派遣到香港任C中队的副队长。

sentences.en: In 1942 he took command of 108 Squadron.
In the first ten days of May our squadron accounted for at least seven enemy aircraft.
sentences.cn: 5月的头10天里我们中队至少报销了7架敌机。

sentences.en: The naval air squadron set to France was soon in the thick of the flight.
sentences.cn: 派到法国的海军航空中队的飞行却日趋频繁.

sentences.en: The nightmares appeared to him with celestial punctuality every single night he spent in the squadron.
sentences.cn: 他睡在中队里的每个晚上,恶梦总象日月星辰运转那样准时地找上他来.

sentences.en: The squadron was protected by a highly mobile anti - tank and air defense.
sentences.cn: 这个中队由高度机动的 反 坦克和防空部队保卫.

sentences.en: The squadron would be forced to keep to international skies.
sentences.cn: 机群将被迫在国际空域飞行.

sentences.en: The squadron's armour is draped in sand-coloured nets that melt into the landscape.
sentences.cn: 装甲连的装甲车上罩着沙色的网，和周围的风景融为一体。

sentences.en: They saw a squadron of fifteen motorcycle policemen driving in V-formation.
sentences.cn: 他们看见15名警察骑着摩托车排成V字形前行。

sentences.en: Yossarian eyed everyone he saw warily when he returned to the squadron from the hospital.
sentences.cn: 尤索林从医院回到中队以后,不管见到谁都要留心地端详一番.

sentences.en: Yuke Landing Force Assault squadron, provide fire support to the amphibious force.
sentences.cn: 进攻中队, 为两栖军提供火力支援.

words.tran_cn: 空军中队；一群；骑兵中队；分遣队；小舰队

trans.tran_cn: 中队，骑兵中队，飞行中队，有组织的一个群体
trans.tran_en: a military force consisting of a group of aircraft or ships
